name: todo-fullstack
description: Full-stack TODO application with Node.js backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node index.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo "âœ… Setup complete! Run 'npm run dev' to start the application"
scripts.clean: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & cd ../frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q .next 2>nul
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install-all

author: Sunil Patil
